topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Chat :: Internet Relay Chat

name: Avenger
short_description: Avenger was planned to be a web and IRC chat client project for Unix-like OS, but unfortunately it hasn't been finished. It was supposed to add functions peer-to-peer to web chats such as file transfer and instant messages.
